name: Minja's Run
description:
Minja's Run is a fast paced endless runner demo to show off unity's quick pick up, create and play usability. 

Press W to Jump (hold for higher jump)

Press S to Slide

collect coins along the way

Best played windowed in 1024 x 768 ratio.

NOW IT'S YOUR TURN!

Interested in making your own game and want to know how to get started? Give me an e-mail and I can set you in the right direction or when our next Game Workshop meet up will take place.

rocco.commisso@gmail.com
